languages.text: "Ну почему же нет? Я слышала немало историй о способах продлить жизнь псайкеру. Только, боюсь, тебе они все не понравятся".

traits.locale_text: "Не кипятись, Констанза. Кое в чем покойная была права: сопутствующий ущерб — обычная плата за содержание кого-то вроде Тласс. Слышали бы вы, что говорят про Семь ведьм на Футфоле и их, кхм, побочный урон".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."
languages.original_text: "Ну почему же нет? Я слышала немало историй о способах продлить жизнь псайкеру. Только, боюсь, тебе они все не понравятся".

traits.locale_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这又是为什么呢？我听说许多故事，关于如何延长灵能者的寿命，但这些故事恐怕你一个都不会喜欢。”
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: “这又是为什么呢？我听说许多故事，关于如何延长灵能者的寿命，但这些故事恐怕你一个都不会喜欢。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué? He oído muchas historias sobre cómo extender la vida de un psíquico, pero no creo que le vayan a gustar».
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué? He oído muchas historias sobre cómo extender la vida de un psíquico, pero no creo que le vayan a gustar».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「どうして？異能者の生命を永らえさせる方法についてはもう十分聞いたわ。まあそのどれも、気に入ってもらえるとは思えないのだけれど」
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: 「どうして？異能者の生命を永らえさせる方法についてはもう十分聞いたわ。まあそのどれも、気に入ってもらえるとは思えないのだけれど」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Warum? Ich kenne viele Geschichten, wie sich das Leben eines Psionikers verlängern lässt. Allerdings werden Euch nicht alle gefallen."
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: "Warum? Ich kenne viele Geschichten, wie sich das Leben eines Psionikers verlängern lässt. Allerdings werden Euch nicht alle gefallen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'en suis pas si sûre. J'ai entendu des tas d'histoires sur les divers moyens de prolonger la vie d'un psyker... même si certains risquent de ne pas vous plaire. »
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en suis pas si sûre. J'ai entendu des tas d'histoires sur les divers moyens de prolonger la vie d'un psyker... même si certains risquent de ne pas vous plaire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nedenmiş? Ruhsezerlerin hayatını uzatmanın yollarını anlatan birçok hikâye duydum. Gerçi çoğunu seveceğinden şüpheliyim."
languages.original_text: "Why? I've heard enough stories about ways of extending a psyker's life. But I don't think you'll like all of them."

traits.locale_text: "Nedenmiş? Ruhsezerlerin hayatını uzatmanın yollarını anlatan birçok hikâye duydum. Muhtemelen çoğunu sevmezsin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
